title: Enable TestOps - Jira integration for test management
description: Katalon TestOps provides a seamless Jira integration that allows you to:Link Jira requirements and Jira defectsLink test runs to Jira releasesWrite BDD scenarios in Jira ticketsView test results from linked Katalon Studio test cases in Jira
